quotes.text: You might not think that programmers are artists, but programming is a extremely creative profession. It's logic-based creativity
quotes.author: John Romero

quotes.text: I am thankful the most important key in history was invented. It's not the key to your house, your car, your boat, your safety deposit box, your bike lock or your private community. It's the key to order, sanity, and peace of mind. The key is 'Delete.
quotes.author: Elayne Booster

quotes.text: The internet could be a very positive step towards education, organisation and participation in a meaningful society.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.text: There is a real danger that computers will develop intelligence and take over. We urgently need to develop direct connections to the brain so that computers can add to human intelligence rather than be in opposition
quotes.author: Stephen Hawkins

quotes.text: One essential object is to choose that arrangement which shall tend to reduce to a minimum the time necessary for completing the calculation.
quotes.author: Ada Lovelace

quotes.text: Hope & curiosity about the future seemed better than guarantees. The unknown was always so attractive to me...and still is.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.text: If women had been more prominently talked about in computing, both in the history books and schools, we literally would not have the lack of women programmers that we do today.
quotes.author: Reshman Saujani

quotes.text: This is a test for a new quote
quotes.author: Monica Lopez
